title: Dawnbringer Riven icon and border not showing up
body: I brought the icon and the border with those order tokens and never received either of them, i've waited 4+ days now

replies.body: That's a really strange issue!  I double checked your account, and it should be in your inventory now.  Thanks for the heads up!
mine is the same way.. not showing up

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=1bP5kQkV,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-20T18:55:38.900+0000)
>
> That's a really strange issue!  I double checked your account, and it should be in your inventory now.  Thanks for the heads up!

Same problem here. Been a couple days and nothing :/
Same here, the Border only shows up on the skins ???
Wait are the borders only for those 2 specific champions? Yasuo and Riven? Don't tell me i just wasted all my coins
I've also had this issue, except only the border isn't showing up.
